name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES Club. With its classic soldier design and a unique combination of traits, Volt stands out among its robotic peers. Its box-like body houses advanced technology and its arms and legs are designed with a hand-down mechanism, allowing it to perform intricate tasks with precision. The screen on Volt's body displays a charming cat image, adding a touch of playfulness to its appearance.
